摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

com.easemob
接口 EMCallBack

public interface EMCallBack

The general callback interface The errors defined in this callback is moved to EMError, so please stop using those errors. We will keep those errors unremoved to keep the compatibility but new error codes will be added in EMError afterwards

字段摘要
static java.lang.Object data
          the addition data returned from callback it maybe null
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION
           
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_CONNECT_TIMER_OUT
          连接服务器超时
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_DNS_ERROR
          DNS 错误
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_ENCRYPTION_ERROR
          数据加密传输错误
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_FILE_NOT_FOUND
          文件不存在异常
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_INVALID_CERTIFICATE
          证书认证错误
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_INVALID_FILE
          无效文件异常，一般文件为0字节时为无效
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_INVALID_KEYSTORE
          密钥认证错误
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_INVALID_PASSWORD_USERNAME
          用户名或密码错误
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_IO_EXCEPTION
          数据读取错误
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_LOGOFFINPROGRESS_ERROR
           
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_NO_ERROR
          无任何异常
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_NONETWORK_ERROR
          网络不可用
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_UNABLE_CONNECT_TO_SERVER
          无法连接到服务器
static int ERROR_EXCEPTION_UNKNOWN_SERVER_ERROR
          无法识别服务器返回值
static int ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND
           
static int ERROR_SEND
           
 
方法摘要
